data.name: Magic Table Chess
data.description:
Welcome to Magic Table Chess, Experiment 7’s first game in the Magic Table™ series. Join our community to experience the magic of chess in virtual reality. This download includes the core chess experience, multiple immersive environments, an original soundtrack and more.

*A Fresh Take on The Classic: Chess has been played for thousands of years, but never like this! Experience classic chess gameplay you know and love in a whole new way, through the magic of virtual reality.

*Multi-Tier AI: Play against battle-tested chess AI that scales from beginner to master. No matter your skill level, we have a Chess challenge perfect for you.

*Breathtaking VR Environments: Leave the stress of the real world behind as you step into a variety of beautiful settings.

*Multiplayer: Reunite with old chess rivals or forge new friendships via invite-a-friend multiplayer.

COMING SOON
*Gear VR Controller: Take control of the board like never before with Gear VR controller-enabled devices.

changelog.change_log:
Magic Table Chess 0.5.0.2 adds voice chat and a host of minor improvements.

WHAT’S NEW 
- VOICE CHAT: Now you can reach out and tell someone how great they're playing. Or ask about the weather!
- VOICE MUTING: We know that you're not always feeling social.
- MOVE HISTORY TAGS: See who made which move. Your name in lights!
- POLISH: Dozens of minor improvements and fixes.

ON THE HORIZON
- MATCHMAKING: Click a button to be matched up with a random opponent...and then crush them.
- TOUCH CONTROLS: More prep work to enable touch controls in a release.
- MORE CUSTOMIZATION: Decorate your room with pictures, custom objects and more.

During beta we iterate through assets based on player feedback and internal review. Expect to see boards and pieces disabled, updated, and adjusted while we determine our final assets.

Join us on social media and at www.experiment7.com.

Magic Table Chess 0.4.8.8 adds the much-requested, much-anticipated invite-a-friend multiplayer mode and player avatar system.

WHAT’S NEW 
- MULTIPLAYER: Invite a friend to face off in a head-to-head chess match.
- AVATARS: Choose from a set of colorful masks to express your in-game personality.
- USER INTERFACE SNAZZINESS: New icons and visuals mean 47% more snazz*.
- CLEANED UP OUR ROOMS: Minor changes for more awesome.

*Our Producer made this up

ON THE HORIZON
- MATCHMAKING: Click a button to be matched up with an opponent...and then crush them.
- VOIP: Voice chat with opposing chess players right in-app.
- TOUCH CONTROLS: More prep work to enable touch controls in a release.

During beta we iterate through assets based on player feedback and internal review. Expect to see boards and pieces disabled, updated, and adjusted while we determine our final launch assets.

Join us on social media and at www.experiment7.com.

﻿Magic Table Chess 0.4.7.0 adds graphical, gameplay and stability improvements.

WHAT’S NEW 
-TAKE BACK MOVES: Gave up your Queen to a Pawn? Take back that move...and never speak of it again!
-NEW HIGHLIGHT SQUARE: See more clearly which square you're looking at.
-LOST SOME WEIGHT: Trimmed the app size for better loading time.
-GAINED SOME STABILITY: Fixed some bugs for a better play experience.
-MINOR AI IMPROVEMENTS: Our AI took a few classes and feels smarter.

ON THE HORIZON
-MAJOR AI IMPROVEMENTS: Our AI continues to up its game for even better (but not necessarily more difficult) matches.
-MULTIPLAYER: Laid the foundation for multiplayer and other fun social features.
-TOUCH CONTROLS: Under-the-hood changes to enable touch control in the future.

During beta we iterate through assets based on player feedback and internal review. Expect to see boards and pieces disabled, updated, and adjusted while we determine our final launch assets.

Join us on social media and at www.experiment7.com.

Magic Table Chess Update 0.4.6.5 introduces a variety of new gameplay features, user interface tweaks, and graphical improvements!

- NEW CHESS SETS - The Staunton and Dubrovnik sets are now available for play, with a variety of materials
- BOARD IMPROVEMENTS - Chess boards in the live game have been swapped.  Current chess boards are now higher resolution and have cleaned up reflection probes (prettier and better readability)
- LAST MOVE HIGHLIGHT - Each player’s most recent moves are now highlighted 
- VICTORY SCREEN - Fireworks for the win!

During beta we are iterating through boards and chess pieces based both on player feedback and our own internal art review. Expect to see boards and pieces disabled, updated, and adjusted over the next few patches while we determine our final game assets for launch.

For more information, join us on social media or at www.experiment7.com.

Release 0.4.5.4
12/01/2016
Changelist #906

DEVELOPER

Chess: 	        [906] Fixes a crash where the opponent moves into a position which would be stalemate for them (if it were their turn).
Chess: 	        [904] Bundle versioning.
Chess: 	        [903] High difficulty scaling readjusted.
Chess: 	        [900] Added difficulty settings to internal AI.
Chess: 	        [9XX] Android APK size reduced.
Chess: 	        [893] Viewheight adjustment button and functionality, Start game effect added for clarity.

Release 0.4.5.0
11/23/2016
Changelist #861

DEVELOPER	
Chess: 	        [861] Changed timing when stockfish return an invalid move. When that happens we give stockfish a full second to calculate it's next move and remove the 2 second wait time before it can move (until a valid move is found).
Chess: 	        [860] Fix for bug #58. Chess visualization reset now handles resetting of promoted pieces properly.
Added check for insufficient material draw condition when only pieces left are: two kings, two kings and a bishop or two kings and a knight.
